title: The Burning question
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural conditions
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Australia
abstract: This place, my space has been transformed.
description: When David moved from the city, he fulfilled a lifetime dream to live in a place he had always visited and dreamed of owning. Losing almost all of his property, he is faced with a burning question in this first-hand account of the devastating Gippsland bushfires. This Digital Storytelling project was created  in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2001359; Stories from the Bushfires; Active; 2009
